SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, USER_ID, NICKNAME, TITLE, WDATE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, DEL, BBSTYPE FROM COMMUNITY_BBS A, MEMBER B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = B.ID
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND NICKNAME=#{search}
ORDER BY COMMUNITY_SEQ DESC

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS WHERE 1=1 AND BBSTYPE='hello'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND NICKNAME=#{search}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_BBS( COMMUNITY_SEQ, USER_ID, TITLE, WDATE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, DEL, BBSTYPE) VALUES(COMMUNITY_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{content}, #{readcount}, 0, 0, #{bbstype})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_BBS SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, WDATE=SYSDATE WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{community_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT( COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, COMMUNITY_SEQ) VALUES(COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '#{user_id}', '#{content}', SYSDATE,0,#{community_seq})
